review.title: “You're just a numbere here.”
review.pros: Pros – You work two weeks on and two weeks off. The pay is good. Most of the people who work on the boat are ok guys.
review.cons: Cons – Old boats and barges. You're just a number here. You can't get anything fixed. You have to fight the captains to get your OT.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – You need to go into HR and clean house now! Also the higher up need to start showing some kind of interest in their workers.
